divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 7:18pm (CST) I observed a bright orange orb which seemed to be heading southeast for 3 minutes then remained stationary near MAywood, IL for about another 2 minutes, continued to keep track of the Orb until it dissapered. Was able to capture the moon and a plane flying near by to compare with the initial orb. The orb was the brightest object in the sky at the moment, brighter than the moon.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Maywood
There were no other sightings in Maywood on or around December 17th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
